title: Looking for friends to play normals
body:
Hi my name is WinniePoohs, I'm level 21 looking for some group to play normal games.

cheers.

replies.body:
Hi there! I'd be happy to play normals with you. (My friends, too.) 

My summoner name is Astrea, feel free to add me!~ (I've no preference for what lane I play, so it's all good!)

Hey mate, if you're up for norms, I'm up for it.

Tundradragon is the name
